title: Brickell Bay Offers Boutique Hotel and Spa Experience on Aruba's Exquisite Palm Beach
text:
Brickell Bay Beach Club & Spa
PALM BEACH , Aruba , Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- As one of the best-kept secrets on Aruba , Brickell Bay Beach Club & Spa is an adults-only resort hotel that encourages guests to enjoy the island's tropical scenery at their own pace. Aruba has seen an uptick in tourism recently, and one glimpse of the famous white sand beaches and azure sky explains why. Brickell Bay is pleased to help visitors to this Caribbean island nation have the time of their lives and make memories that will last forever. More information is available here .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150929/271783
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150929/271784
Upon arrival, guests are immediately greeted with bell service, a welcome cocktail and a refreshingly cold face towel. The hotel is committed to guaranteeing new guests can forget the stress of travel and get their vacation started on the right note. The front desk is open 24 hours, and the staff are always eager to answer questions and help guests have an optimal experience. Business travelers will appreciate the 24-hour business center, while all guests can feel at ease knowing that Brickell Bay has a doctor ready to provide care any time of day or night.
Having been recently renovated, Brickell Bay's rooms offer all the amenities one could expect at a luxury resort, without the luxury price tag. Directly across from Brickell Bay is a postcard-worthy white sand beach. Guests can relax on complimentary beach chairs. Brickell Bay extends beverage and towel service to all beach goers, ensuring that everyone can kick back to their hearts' content.
For those who want to enjoy the water but not necessarily the Caribbean Sea, Brickell Bay features a tranquil and inviting freshwater outdoor pool. Among the more memorable features of the pool is its swim-up bar, serving every tropical cocktail imaginable, among other refreshments. Adjacent to the pool is The Orchid Spa, where guests can enjoy a massage, skin treatment, manicure or pedicure any day of the week. Spa staff even offer in-room services.
Brickell Bay's Palm Beach location puts the hotel at ground zero for many of the top tourist spots on the entire island. More than three dozen eateries are all within walking distance. So too are shopping malls, vibrant casinos and numerous choices for live entertainment.
About Brickell Bay Beach Club & Spa
Brickell Bay Beach Club & Spa Boutique Hotel is centrally located to all the activities available on the prestigious strip of Palm Beach , offering personalized service throughout your stay. With an architecture and style that gracefully blends Caribbean charm with modern chic, Brickell Bay Beach Club & Spa features two room categories with a choice of Superior or Deluxe rooms and two Deluxe Honeymoon Suites. See images at http://www.brickellbayaruba.com/gallery-4-columns.html .
